question.title: Quarkus Mailer dynamic multi-tenant / multiple configurations
question.body:
It seems that Quarkus Mailer is the modern JavaMail replacement for Quarkus. How do I use it for multi-tenancy?

I understand that it supports "static" wiring such as https://quarkus.io/guides/mailer-reference#multiple-mailer-configurations

EDIT: I'm building a SaaS where my customers can send emails using my platform to their customers using their own branding. For example, imagine I'm building a Salesforce clone, where salespeople of Company X can send emails from my app, but the emails are "branded" using their own (Company X) mail settings, e.g. from sales@companyx.com. Obviously I want to store email settings of each customer in a DB, instead of manually editing application.properties every time there's a new customer.
